content_parts.title: Common
Features
_jql: project = XT AND issuetype in (Epic, Story) AND 'X3 Release Note Status' in ('Communicated, Validated by PO/PM','Review Done') AND 'X3 Release Note Grouping' = 'Common' AND (statusCategory in (Done) OR status = 'Release Candidate') AND (resolution is EMPTY OR resolution = Done) AND (component is EMPTY OR component not in componentMatch('^Addon*')) AND 'X3 Epic Type' not in (Internal, Research) AND 'X3 Epic Type' = New AND fixVersion in x3ReleasesComponentsMatch("XT 2023 R4 (34.0.0)")

content_parts.title: Sage Intacct integration improvements for asynchronous operations

content_parts.content:
You can manage asynchronous integrations with Sage Intacct items on the Integration page. This page includes a list of items being processed that you can filter by key (item name), status, and version.

Use the refresh button to synchronize all items or you can select and synchronize specific items in the list.

Note: This information no longer displays on the Notification history page or the Sage Intacct mapping page on the Data tab.

content_parts.title: Sales and Purchasing enhancements

content_parts.content:
Sales improvements

For sales documents, the Origin tab in the Line panel displays the originating document for the current line.

Purchasing improvements

For purchase orders, you can duplicate a line on the main list.

For purchase invoices and credit memos, you can filter by status and access the Add line from action from the Add line button.

For purchase invoices, receipts, and returns, the document status displays in the Add lines from window.

content_parts.title: Distribution
Features
_jql: project = XT AND issuetype in (Epic, Story) AND 'X3 Release Note Status' in ('Communicated, Validated by PO/PM','Review Done') AND 'X3 Release Note Grouping' = 'Distribution' AND (statusCategory in (Done) OR status = 'Release Candidate') AND (resolution is EMPTY OR resolution = Done) AND (component is EMPTY OR component not in componentMatch('^Addon*')) AND 'X3 Epic Type' not in (Internal, Research) AND 'X3 Epic Type' = New AND fixVersion in x3ReleasesComponentsMatch("XT 2023 R4 (34.0.0)")

content_parts.title: Manage allocations for sales order and shipment lines

content_parts.content:
From sales order and shipment lines, you can view where stock is allocated for the same item so you can review allocations and make effective decisions when there is a shortage.

Use the line action Transfer allocations to move stock from another document or documents to the current document.

content_parts.title: Stock deallocation process

content_parts.content: Deallocating reserved stock from an order processes the lots using a FEFO (First Expired, First Out) or FIFO (First In, First Out) method which is determined by the Lot management and Expiration date management rules for each item.

content_parts.title: Purchase order batch printing from the main list

content_parts.content: From the Purchase order main list, you can select and print multiple records.

content_parts.title: Stock allocation result inquiry

content_parts.content: Use the Allocation result inquiry in the Stock inquiries menu to view allocation and deallocation details for an order.

content_parts.title: Mass work order stock allocation and deallocation

content_parts.content: Use the Work order mass allocation page to allocate and deallocate stock from component lines for all or a group of work orders linked to a site.

content_parts.title: Improvements
_jql: project = XT AND ((issuetype in (Epic, Story) AND 'X3 Release Note Status' in ('Communicated, Validated by PO/PM','Review Done') AND 'X3 Release Note Grouping' = 'Distribution' AND (statusCategory in (Done) OR status = 'Release Candidate') AND (resolution is EMPTY OR resolution = Done) AND (component is EMPTY OR component not in componentMatch('^Addon*')) AND 'X3 Epic Type' not in (Internal, Research) AND 'X3 Epic Type' = Improvement) OR (issuetype = Bug AND 'X3 ReadMe Check' in ('To be communicated') AND 'X3 ReadMe Check' in ('Validated by PO') AND 'X3 Product Area' = 'Distribution' AND status in (Done) AND (component is EMPTY OR component not in componentMatch('^Addon*')) AND 'X3 Behaviour Change' = Yes)) AND fixVersion in x3ReleasesComponentsMatch("XT 2023 R4 (34.0.0)")

content_parts.title: Sales: Repeat customer notes on subsequent documents

content_parts.content:
For sales orders, shipments, invoices, and return requests, you can repeat customer notes on all subsequent documents.

If you enter customer notes on the line level in the Line panel, you can also repeat these notes on lines in subsequent documents.

content_parts.title: Bug Fixes
_jql: project = XT AND issuetype = Bug AND 'X3 ReadMe Check' in ('To be communicated') AND 'X3 ReadMe Check' in ('Validated by PO') AND 'X3 Product Area' = 'Distribution' AND status in (Done) AND (component is EMPTY OR component not in componentMatch('^Addon*')) AND (fixVersion in x3ReleasesComponentsMatch("XT 2023 R4 (34.0.0)") OR issueFunction in linkedIssuesOf("issueFunction in x3FindContentsOfImagefixes(\"XT 2023 R4 (34.0.0)\")", "is hotfix of")) AND issue not in (XT-53093,XT-52437,XT-52295,XT-52242,XT-51894,XT-51874,XT-50765,XT-50764,XT-46509)

content_parts.title: Purchase requisition: It is no longer possible to add a supplier on approved requisitions

content_parts.content: For an approved purchase requisition, you can no longer add or delete a line. Only certain actions such as the "Apply default supplier" and adding a supplier in the edit line panel can be changed, as well as all subsequent fields like the price, currency, and amount.

content_parts.title: Sales orders: Filter not available in the Select sold-to customer field lookup

content_parts.content: On the Sales order page, the sold-to customer lookup includes the ability to filter columns.

content_parts.title: MRP calculation result: Line incorrectly displays as ordered

content_parts.content: On the MRP calculation results page, when you select Create work order or Create purchase order for a suggestion, the line status no longer changes when you select the X icon to close the panel.

content_parts.title: Extra space on Purchase requisition and Purchase receipt pages

content_parts.content: The extra space at the bottom of the header section on the Purchase requisition and Purchase receipt pages was removed.

content_parts.title: Set dimensions action is available for documents that are closed, posted, or shipped

content_parts.content: For sales and purchasing documents, the Set dimension button is not available for documents that are closed, posted, or shipped.

content_parts.title: Sales invoice and Purchase credit note pages: Add line action button displays on an empty row while posting

content_parts.content: On the Sales invoice and Purchase credit memo pages, the empty row is hidden when the document is posted or posting in progress.

content_parts.title: Need to reprint a purchase order that is fully processed

content_parts.content: Purchase orders can be printed even if they are closed.

content_parts.title: Purchase orders: Items to select not restricted to those available from the supplier

content_parts.content:
A list of items only contains the items available from the supplier.
If the item is stock managed, the filter is combined with item sites.

content_parts.title: Sales return request: Create button removed

content_parts.content: The Create button is no longer available on the Sales return request page because you cannot create a return request on this page.

content_parts.title: Manufacturing
Features
_jql: project = XT AND issuetype in (Epic, Story) AND 'X3 Release Note Status' in ('Communicated, Validated by PO/PM','Review Done') AND 'X3 Release Note Grouping' = 'Manufacturing' AND (statusCategory in (Done) OR status = 'Release Candidate') AND (resolution is EMPTY OR resolution = Done) AND (component is EMPTY OR component not in componentMatch('^Addon*')) AND 'X3 Epic Type' not in (Internal, Research) AND 'X3 Epic Type' = New AND fixVersion in x3ReleasesComponentsMatch("XT 2023 R4 (34.0.0)")

content_parts.title: Tracking from a BoM and a work order

content_parts.content:
Use the Trackings tab in the Bill of material page to view a summary of the work orders created to build or maintain the BOM and any related material, production, or time tracking documents.
Use the Trackings block in the Work order page to view the same material, production, and time tracking documents.

content_parts.title: Bug Fixes
_jql: project = XT AND issuetype = Bug AND 'X3 ReadMe Check' in ('To be communicated') AND 'X3 ReadMe Check' in ('Validated by PO') AND 'X3 Product Area' = 'Manufacturing' AND status in (Done) AND (component is EMPTY OR component not in componentMatch('^Addon*')) AND (fixVersion in x3ReleasesComponentsMatch("XT 2023 R4 (34.0.0)") OR issueFunction in linkedIssuesOf("issueFunction in x3FindContentsOfImagefixes(\"XT 2023 R4 (34.0.0)\")", "is hotfix of")) AND issue not in (XT-53093,XT-52437,XT-52295,XT-52242,XT-51894,XT-51874,XT-50765,XT-50764,XT-46509)

content_parts.title: MRP calculation justification: Company, site, and item filters unavailable

content_parts.content: A Site ID, Company ID, and Item ID filter is available in the Details grid.

content_parts.title: Time tracking fails if WO routing or BOM is in development

content_parts.content: The time tracking works correctly when a WO routing or BOM status is changed to In development.

content_parts.title: Production tracking fails if a WO routing or BOM is in development

content_parts.content: The production tracking works correctly when a work order is selected and tracked using a work order routing or BOM that has been changed to In development.

content_parts.title: Only the last time tracking in work order operations is considered for costs

content_parts.content: All time tracking created in work order operations are considered for setup and run time costs and completed quantity.

content_parts.title: Work order creation crash when not confirmed by clicking on cross icon

content_parts.content: An error is no longer displayed if you exit the New work order panel before entering or selecting any field values.

content_parts.title: MRP caclulation result page displays unclear error message

content_parts.content: After deleting an item and opening a previous MRP calculation request including the deleted item, the error message no longer displays.

content_parts.title: Material tracking fails if a work order routing or BOM is in development

content_parts.content: The material tracking works correctly when a work order is selected and tracked using a work order routing or BOM that has been changed to In development.

content_parts.title: Work order status not updated when material tracking created

content_parts.content: The work order status updates correctly when a material tracking is created.

content_parts.title: Work order: When changing released quantity, component quantity included through material tracking should not change

content_parts.content: The quantity of components included through material tracking does not change when changing the released quantity.

content_parts.title: MRP calculation result: company, site, and item filters unavailable

content_parts.content: On the MRP calculation result page, the company, site, and item filters are available to use.

content_parts.title: Platform
Bug Fixes
_jql: project = XT AND issuetype = Bug AND 'X3 ReadMe Check' in ('To be communicated') AND 'X3 ReadMe Check' in ('Validated by PO') AND 'X3 Product Area' = 'Platform' AND status in (Done) AND (component is EMPTY OR component not in componentMatch('^Addon*')) AND (fixVersion in x3ReleasesComponentsMatch("XT 2023 R4 (34.0.0)") OR issueFunction in linkedIssuesOf("issueFunction in x3FindContentsOfImagefixes(\"XT 2023 R4 (34.0.0)\")", "is hotfix of")) AND issue not in (XT-53093,XT-52437,XT-52295,XT-52242,XT-51894,XT-51874,XT-50765,XT-50764,XT-46509)

content_parts.title: Sorting on custom fields sometimes does not work

content_parts.content: The issue related to sorting custom fields was resolved.

content_parts.title: Reference data
Bug Fixes
_jql: project = XT AND issuetype = Bug AND 'X3 ReadMe Check' in ('To be communicated') AND 'X3 ReadMe Check' in ('Validated by PO') AND 'X3 Product Area' = 'Reference data' AND status in (Done) AND (component is EMPTY OR component not in componentMatch('^Addon*')) AND (fixVersion in x3ReleasesComponentsMatch("XT 2023 R4 (34.0.0)") OR issueFunction in linkedIssuesOf("issueFunction in x3FindContentsOfImagefixes(\"XT 2023 R4 (34.0.0)\")", "is hotfix of")) AND issue not in (XT-53093,XT-52437,XT-52295,XT-52242,XT-51894,XT-51874,XT-50765,XT-50764,XT-46509)

content_parts.title: Unable to delete an Item-site supplier

content_parts.content: On the Item-site page, you can delete a supplier from an item-site at the line level.

content_parts.title: User experience
Bug Fixes
_jql: project = XT AND issuetype = Bug AND 'X3 ReadMe Check' in ('To be communicated') AND 'X3 ReadMe Check' in ('Validated by PO') AND 'X3 Product Area' = 'User experience' AND status in (Done) AND (component is EMPTY OR component not in componentMatch('^Addon*')) AND (fixVersion in x3ReleasesComponentsMatch("XT 2023 R4 (34.0.0)") OR issueFunction in linkedIssuesOf("issueFunction in x3FindContentsOfImagefixes(\"XT 2023 R4 (34.0.0)\")", "is hotfix of")) AND issue not in (XT-53093,XT-52437,XT-52295,XT-52242,XT-51894,XT-51874,XT-50765,XT-50764,XT-46509)

content_parts.title: Partially received sales return requests do not display with open statuses

content_parts.content: Partially received sales return requests display when you filter for Open statuses on the main list.
